Class BlockNodeSyncing

java.lang.Object
com.kneelawk.graphlib.syncing.knet.api.graph.user.BlockNodeSyncing
public final class BlockNodeSyncing extends Object
Holds a block node encoder and decoder.

  • Field Details

    • REF_CODEC

      public static final net.minecraft.network.codec.StreamCodec<net.minecraft.network.FriendlyByteBuf,BlockNodeSyncing> REF_CODEC
      BlockNodeSyncing static stream codec.

      This requires the KNetSyncedUniverse.ATTACHMENT_KEY attachment. This can optionally make use of the GraphLibSyncingKNet.ID_PALETTE attachment.
